result.name: Gen-Res-Alentejo ? Use of Genomics in the Selection of Sheep Resistant to Parasites and Footrot in Alentejo
result.description: The main objective is identify molecular markers associated to footrot and gastrointestinal nematodes in Portuguese Merino sheep.
result.center: CEBAL - Centro de Biotecnologia Agricola e Agro-Alimentar do Alentejo
